name: Stoner Stevie in Asstown (GBTK #3 Jam)
description:
Stoner Stevie needs to collect all the dank weed so he can be cool!

GMS2 Project File is available to download if you want to fix my game :)

Made for Gamebreaker's Toolkit Jam #3 where the goal is to make a really bad game.

Content warning: this game contains a lot of (ironic) drug references. It also has some mild swearing

Epilepsy warning: This game features flashing images throughout and may not be suitable for those who suffer from photosensitive epilepsy or other conditions

Credits

Edward Atkin - Programming, design, graphics, music

DisOmikron - a'capella music, sound effects, screeching, laughing, etc (and also testing). He spent literally several minutes helping me with this project.

In memory of Tommy van Son who gave up his sanity in order to play test this game for me (he also suggested I add a mini map, thanks Tommy)

Key influences
  • The game's name is a play on "Junky Jenny in Gaytown" by Butthole Surfers
  • The main menu theme is a homage to the Crazy Bus Theme
